articles.description: Embed from Getty Images Neil Critchley has been named as QPR’s new head coach following the departure of former boss Mick Beale. The 44-year-old has been out of work since leaving Aston Villa in October, where he was assistant manager to Steven Gerrard – a ro…
articles.content:
Neil Critchley has been named as QPRs new head coach following the departure of former boss Mick Beale.

articles.content:

articles.title: Pakistan v England: Ben Stokes says tourists' victory is not 'just another series win' - BBC
articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes says his side know their victory in Pakistan is not "just another series win".
articles.content:
England have won eight out of nine Test matches since Ben Stokes became captain, having lost 11 of their previous 17.

articles.title: England secure historic series win after Mark Wood breaks Pakistan resistance - The Guardian
articles.description: England have won the second Test in Multan by 26 runs to seal series victory as the hosts’ fightback fell just short
